Name: Cyber Escape
About the game: Cyber Escape is an infinite runner in which you must survive as long as you can in an attempt to escape the police of a future dystopian world after your smuggling run went wrong. Smash cars out of your way to gain a higher streak and get more points, and risk it all by moving closer to the front for a higher multiplier- but a better chance at getting hit by the oncoming traffic.
Meta Title: Cyber Escape: Mar 29, 2018, Fogbound and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cyber Escape? Check out the release date (Mar 29, 2018), developer insights from Fogbound, and a complete game summary.
